panel.label: Earned by repairing your teams structures

label.ontrigger: Set('_GameListPlayers',param0); SetText('Game Browser - ^r' # Round(_GameListPlayers + _UnofficialGameListPlayers) # '^* Players on ^r' # param1 # ' ^*Servers');
label.ontrigger0: SetText('Game Browser - ^r' # Round(_GameListPlayers + _UnofficialGameListPlayers) # '^* Players on ^r' # param1 # ' ^*Servers');

instance.name: qconnect_checkbox
instance.label: Only Connect To Official S2 Games Servers

frame.label: This icon represents an Official S2 Games server where your stats will be recorded.

table.name: server_list

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Quick Connect
instance.tip: Clicking the quick connect button will automatically find the server with an open slot and the lowest ping. Quick Connect will also avoid empty servers, unless no other servers are available. By default, only official S2 Games Servers are selected.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Account Level
instance.tip: Your account level is determined by the experience you accumulate over time by playing official games. Upon achieving level 25, your account is converted to Prime status for free, with all of the related benefits. This account level also determines which servers you can join, but has no relation to the levels in-game, and has no bearing on your in-game unit.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Account Level
instance.tip: Your account level is determined by the experience you accumulate over time by playing official games. This level reflects your player experience, and may be used to determine which servers you can join. This account level has no relation to the in-game levels, and has no bearing on your in-game unit.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Account Type
instance.tip: You have a Prime Account. Thank you for supporting independent gaming!

panel.name: accttypebasic_tip
panel.label: Your account is currently a basic (free) account. You're missing out on several key features that could greatly improve your Savage 2 experience:
Access to replays of every match ever played
Your account is automatically converted to Prime status ^yfor free, ^wwith all of the above benefits, upon achieving ^gaccount level 25.
You can also upgrade to Prime immediately, accompanied by two random 60-day runes, all for a ^yone-time^w fee of only ^g$9.99!
Achievements Overview

Achievements are earned while you play Savage 2. Each time you earn a new achievement, you are rewarded with a scratch-off ticket, which is used to create a Persistent Item that you can place in your Item Vault. To claim your item, visit the Savage 2 website and log into the account management area.
Types of Achievements
Match & Lifetime
Action Player & Commander
Viewing Achievements
You can view your achievement progress at your player stats page on our website (www.savage2.com). You can also view other players' stats and progress.
Prime Account Notice
Only players with Prime accounts are able to complete achievements and view player stats.
Why wait until level 25?
Upgrade your account now and claim two random 60-day runes, together with the various perks that Prime Members normaly receive! Get all of the above for a one time fee of only $9.99!
Prime Account Features:
Access to replays of every match ever played

instance.name: round_button2
instance.onclick: playsound('/shared/sounds/ui/button_click.mp3'); Call('chatbox', 'If(StringLength(this) and (!StringEquals(SubString(this,0,4),_customclient_chat_color_prefix) or (StringLength(this) gt 4)), ChatSendMessage(this));'); Call('chatbox', 'EraseInputLine(); SetInputLine(_customclient_chat_color_prefix); SetFocus(1);');
instance.label: Send Message

panel.label: Can also be opened with CTRL+TAB

listbox.name: user_listbox
listbox.onrightclick: PlaySound('/shared/sounds/ui/button_rightclick.mp3'); Call('userlist_tooltip', 'SetVisible(true);'); Call('userlist_tooltip', 'SetX(\'' # param0 # '\');'); Call('userlist_tooltip', 'SetY(\'' # param1 # '\');'); Call('userlist_tooltip', 'ListBoxCmd(\'SelectNone\');'); SetFocusName('userlist_tooltip');

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Item Vault
instance.tip: Your Item Vault contains the persistent items you can take into each game with you. There are five slots, however you can only take a maximum of two items onto the battlefield at any one time. You can earn items by completing Achievements, referring friends, or by using the Rune Builder.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Achievements
instance.tip: Achievements are earned while you play Savage 2. Each time you earn a new achievement, you are rewarded with a scratch off ticket, which is used to create a Persistent Item that you can place in your Item Vault. To claim your item, visit the Savage 2 website and log into the account management area.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Clan & Community Panel
instance.tip: The CC panel is an overlay that allows you to easily manage your buddies, clanmates, private messages, and more. It is available at all times, and can by opened by pressing CTRL+TAB.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Unmet
instance.tip: This is the default state for all achievements. By playing well and meeting certain requirements, you can unlock silver or gold status for the achievement.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Silver
instance.tip: The initial level of play has been met and you've reached silver status for the achievement. You are rewarded with a persistent item scratch-off ticket for reaching this state.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Gold
instance.tip: A second, higher level of play for this achievement has been met, and you have been awarded with a second persistent item scratch-off ticket for this achievement. Gold status is significantly harder to achieve than silver status.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Match & Lifetime
instance.tip: Match achievements are earned through outstanding play over the course of a match. Lifetime achievements accumulate over the life of your account.

instance.name: browser_tip
instance.title: Action Player & Commander
instance.tip: Full sets of match and lifetime achievements are available for both action players and commanders.

label.ontrigger: SetText('Your clan is participating in the clan match of ^y' # ClanMatchClanName # '^* vs ^y' # ClanMatchVsName # '^* on the server ^g' # ClanMatchServerName # '^*.');

listbox.name: map_listbox
map_listbox
map_listbox

panel.name: browser_unclaimed_tip
panel.label: Scratch Tickets are awarded to players for completing game achievements, referring friends and participating in special events. You can use those tickets to get random persistent items for your item vault. Just login at the official site and use the "Claim Persistent Items" link at the right. The items you earn will become available at the game loadout for you to equip and use on the battlefield.
